sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-switch
        label="Toggle between light and dark theme."
        v-model="darkMode"
        @change="changeTheme"
      >
      </v-switch>
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "SettingsView",
  data() {
    return {
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getTheme() {
      const themeMode = localStorage.getItem("theme");
      console.log(themeMode);
    },
    changeTheme() {
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
  },
  computed: {},
  mounted() {
    localStorage.setItem("theme", false);
  },
};
</script>
